issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots

issue.title: qiwi.gg
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://qiwi.gg/file/iEW38432-AdguardBrowserExtension-4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fqiwi.gg%2Ffile%2FiEW38432-AdguardBrowserExtension-4) ### Comment > The annoyance is the "Click here to unlock" button that must be clicked in order to get the actual download link. The only purpose of that button is to open new tabs with ads. Although any new tabs are blocked, you still have to click a useless button to get the download. Ideally the download button would be available directly, as the client already has all the info needed to display the link. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5aalij0vlpgkg4ok84k08400sss4ow4o9eudnk1t74.png?nc=1)
